title: askone.ai
description:
askone.ai is a browser extension powered by large language models, designed to help you quickly get powerful support from the language model while browsing the web. It supports GPT, Gemini, Claude, Llama, and Qwen.

askone.ai offers the most convenient way to interact with large language models without disrupting the original design of the webpage. It eliminates the need to switch between different windows or copy and paste.
